content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.5 KNOWLEDGE SOURCES\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Below you can find some ways how TIC specialist can find necessary and useful information:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Technical Interview \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/TI/Technical+Interview+Program+2.0\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Knowledge Base page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\":Â \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Google: especially if requester uses a lot of unfamiliar words and abbreviations so that we could not understand the essence of the problem at all. It is also useful to google info on some non-EPAM developed systems or info on various programming languages, frameworks, and libraries, on different.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mentor, Resource manager and Senior Staff: this knowledge source is mentioned as the last one on purpose as usually all the above-mentioned sources are informative enough to find all the needed workflow description for correct request assigning and processing.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
